# HKMetadataKeySexualActivityProtectionUsed

**Global Variable**

A key that indicates whether protection was used during sexual activity. This metadata key can be used with [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryTypeIdentifier/sexualActivity] category samples.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeySexualActivityProtectionUsed: String
```

## Discussion

Set this key’s value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if protection was used during sexual activity; otherwise, set it to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: HKMetadataKeySexualActivityProtectionUsed
